TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
MEMORANDUM REGARDING DELEGATED LEGISLATION
Clauses 1(4), 8, 12(1), 14,15,16, 18, 21(7), 22, 23, 24(5), 25, 27(8), 29, 30, 31, 33, 35, 38(3), 41, 43, 44, 45, 46, 48, 56 and 65 of the Bill authorize, the Government, the Syndicate, the Academic Council and other authorities of the University to prescribe the manner and the method if giving effect to certain provisions of the proposed Act, when enacted and brought into operation, by issuing suitable notifications statutes, ordinances, regulations or directions as the case may be.
2. The powers delegated are normal and not or an exceptional character.
DR. K. PONMUDY,
Minister for Higher Education.
M. SELVARAJ, Secretary.
175
